# foo.ts
export const foo: string = 'bar';

# bar.json
console.log('foo');

# foo.d.ts
// unrelated content is overwritten

# data.txt
this is data

# jsr.json
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "exports": {
    "./foo": "./foo.ts",
    "./bar": "./bar.json"
  }
}

# output
== /bar.json ==
console.log('foo');

== /data.txt ==
this is data

== /foo.d.ts ==
export declare const foo: string;
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,eyJ2ZXJzaW9uIjozLCJzb3VyY2VzIjpbImZvby50cyJdLCJuYW1lcyI6W10sIm1hcHBpbmdzIjoiQUFBQSxPQUFPLGNBQU0sS0FBSyxNQUFNLENBQVMifQ==

== /foo.js ==
export const foo = 'bar';
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,eyJ2ZXJzaW9uIjozLCJzb3VyY2VzIjpbImZvby50cyJdLCJuYW1lcyI6W10sIm1hcHBpbmdzIjoiQUFBQSxPQUFPLE1BQU0sTUFBYyxNQUFNIn0=

== /foo.ts ==
export const foo: string = 'bar';

== /jsr.json ==
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "exports": {
    "./foo": "./foo.ts",
    "./bar": "./bar.json"
  }
}

== /package.json ==
{
  "name": "@jsr/scope__foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "homepage": "http://jsr.test/@scope/foo",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {},
  "exports": {
    "./foo": {
      "types": "./foo.d.ts",
      "default": "./foo.js"
    },
    "./bar": {
      "default": "./bar.json"
    }
  },
  "_jsr_revision": 0
}
